mapper.select: SELECT sck.ID AS 'id', sck.KEYWORD_ID AS 'keywordId', sck.KEYWORD AS 'keyword', sck.URL AS 'url', sck.TERMINAL_TYPE AS 'terminalType', sck.CURRENT_POSITION AS 'currentPosition', sqz.SEARCH_ENGINE AS 'searchEngine' FROM sys_customer_keyword sck, sys_qz_setting sqz WHERE sck.QS_ID = sqz.QS_ID and sck.QS_ID = #{qsId} and sck.STATUS = 2
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_customer_keyword k, t_pt_customer_keyword tpck SET k.CURRENT_POSITION = tpck.fCurrentPosition, k.CAPTURE_POSITION_TIME = tpck.fCapturePositionQueryTime WHERE k.QS_ID = #{qsId} and k.KEYWORD_ID = tpck.fUuid and tpck.fMark = 2
UPDATE sys_customer_keyword k, t_pt_customer_keyword tpck SET k.OPERA_STATUS = tpck.fOperaStatus WHERE k.QS_ID = #{qsId} and k.KEYWORD_ID = tpck.fUuid and tpck.fMark = 2
